com.kite.orm.dao
Interface KiteDao<T>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractKiteDao
public interface KiteDao<T>

The super class of Data Access Objects generated through the kite framework. This class offers utility routines for quickly invoking queries and manipulating persistence objects.

Author:
Deepak Garg
